sentences.sContent: He never recovered from the death of his beloved daughter.
sentences.sCn: 他一直没有走出失去爱女的阴影。

sentences.sContent: He’s always talking about his beloved computer!
sentences.sCn: 他老是在谈论他的宝贝电脑！

sentences.sContent: It was a gift from her beloved.
sentences.sCn: 那是她心爱的人送的礼物。

remMethod.val: 来自be loved(被爱) → 所钟爱的， 所爱戴的

trans.tranOther: someone who is loved very much
